description: Zed Business Layer - Facade: The Spryker\Zed\Search\Business\SearchFacade::delete() is using an invalid return type "\Elastica\Response" which violates the rule "Every Facade should only return native types or transfer objects."

Zed Business Layer - Facade: The Spryker\Zed\Search\Business\SearchFacade::getDocument() is using an invalid return type "\Elastica\Document" which violates the rule "Every Facade should only return native types or transfer objects."
